article_title: Running club at Bolton Elementary brings benefits to students and their teachers
article_text:
Thank you for reading 12 free articles on our site. og.description: Unexpectedly sunny skies quickly clouded up last Thursday afternoon and before anyone had time to react: big, fat rain drops starting falling on the hot pink T-shirts of the Bolton Girls Move club. The girls, more than a dozen third, fourth- and fifth-graders, kept right on running past the open gym door where others caught in the pop-up shower scurried for shelter.
